snippet: Mr. Lay’s hard-drinking, rebel persona was an inspiration for Mark Rylance’s Tony- and Olivier-winning performance in Jez Butterworth’s play “Jerusalem.”
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lay’s hard-drinking, rebel persona was an inspiration for Mark Rylance’s Tony- and Olivier-winning performance in Jez Butterworth’s play “Jerusalem.”

headline.main: Micky Lay, a Source for ‘Jerusalem,’ Dies at 73
headline.print_headline: Micky Lay, 73, an Inspiration For a Theatrical Character
